item.description:
Kick-off the summer with one of Sunset's amazing flights. The samples are generous and you have the opportunity to try more than one craft beer. From summer styles to "stuck in the mud," you won't be disappointed!

What more could you want on a late summer afternoon? How 'bout their famous nachos or a plate of wimpy burgers? Yeah, you read that right - wimpy burgers. Some bars call 'em "sliders," but not Sunset. You might want to "man up" with a regular burger, smothered in their special 3-bean chili. Whatever it is that you order, make sure you save room for the brew!

Hope to see you there!

For back story, read some Yelp reviews: http://www.yelp.com/b...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll reserve a table for us. (And I'm the one drinking the dark flight)
item.name: Sunset Flight on a Summer Night
